column4: hi I wondering if I was to install ubuntu if my printer and camera would still work
Easy way to tell is to try.  Drop in the Ubuntu Live CD and see if it works.  :)
The problem is that lots of cameras (especially) the name on the outside has no relationship to the actual circuitry inside.
So, you can't tell without trying (the mfgr changes chipsets in mid-run because another chipset got cheaper or they got a better deal.
